Great idea. All disks are new and cases undamaged. Something for every member of the family in this pack.

Soul Surfer is really good.
Mighty Macs was not as good, though I liked the story...it just fell flat for some reason.
When The Game Stands Tall exceeded expectations.  The coach seemed very different than the real coach the movie is based on though.  Excellent, excellent story.
 I haven't watched Able's Field yet.  I'm guessing all the stories are based on a true story...I know the first three were,

Love havinghaving a 4 movies together so we only take one disc on a long car ride instead of 4 separate ones.
Bought this for Soul Surfer and Mighty Macs, but NICE collection.  Will watch them again!
Great set of inspiring movies.
Great movie.!!!
Excellent movies
Awwesome family movies

Another great value for 4 movies! I thought Mighty Macs had a few themes that did not make the film "G" rated. As a Christian, I don't celebrate "Halloween" and the only thing Soul Surfer had was some Halloween theme in their home during that time. Abel's Field was a good lesson learned, as well as When the Game Stands Tall. I HIGHLY recommend "Facing the Giants" for THE BEST Football movie! I am not a Football fan, but bought these football films to watch with my spouse who is.

All movies are good for families and are well made.  Discs are easy to navigate and recording quality is good.

I think my favorite is When the Game Stands Tall, but Soul Surfer is close and all are good.  They aren't offensively heavy on the Christian messages, but not shy at all about it.  Good balance.  Three are true stories.  All make you feel good.
Very bud quality. No sound and with a lot of breaks. No way to watch it.
